task.title: Enable/Disable Call Waiting
task.shortdesc: Call waiting allows you to receive incoming call alerts while you are on a call.

p.note: The Call Waiting settings on the IP phone has a higher priority than the Call Waiting settings on PBX.

step.cmd: Go to Me Extension Settings Other Settings , check the option Call Waiting to enable call waiting.
Uncheck the option Call Waiting to disable call waiting.
